item.title: About me!
item.description: Welcome to my blog. It is an honor to introduce myself to you guys. First of all, my name is Le Anh Duc, i am a Vietnamese citizen (for now). After 12 years of primary education1 in Vietnam, i went to a Japan to study bachelor ’s degree in Social Sciences at Ritsumeikan APU2. My major is Social, Media, and Culture. And here i am writing a Computer Science ’s blog to record what i have learned through out the year.
